title: Bobby Heenan
summary: Raymond Louis Heenan (November 1, 1944  â€“ September 17, 2017) was an American professional wrestling manager, color commentator, wrestler, and comedian, best known for his time with the American Wrestling Association (AWA), the World Wrestling Federation (WWF, now WWE) and World Championship Wrestling (WCW) under the ring name Bobby "The Brain" Heenan.
